articles.author: Richard Pallardy
articles.title: Bizarre evolutionary roots of Africa's iconic upside-down baobab trees revealed - Livescience.com
articles.description: The baobab tree evolved on the island of Madagascar before eventually spreading to Africa and Australia, new research suggests.
articles.content: The iconic, "upside-down" baobab tree first emerged on the island of Madagascar, new research into its tangled evolutionary history reveals. It's still not clear, however, how it jumped from Madagasc… [+3025 chars]
